summary: The bridge over the White River provides everything a Bandit Chief could hope for. Overhauled exterior with new smithing area, merchants, followers, hirelings, camps, your own Boss's player home, and a brand new interior with tavern. Requires BANDIT EMPIRES
descriptionHtml:
Turn Valtheim Towers from a ruin into the capital of your own bandit kingdom!

THIS MOD REQUIRES THE MAIN BANDIT EMPIRES MOD TO FUNCTION

FEATURES:
- Overhauled exterior, now with stockades and guard towers to watch the road for toll paying "customers", and camp for your warband.
- Loyal bandit NPCs patrol the bridge, and act to protect your camp.
- New cliff-side smithing area with all the essentials, smelter, forge, grind stone, workbench, tanning rack and wood chopping block
- Boss Cabin - simple bandit themed player home within the Northern tower, containing safe storage chests, food, bed and some weapon racks.
- New interior area accessible by trap doors in either tower, containing a home for bandits and followers, a tavern, and underground stream, leading under the waterfall.
- Merchants of all varieties will be available at certain days / times, including fences, skooma dealers, hunters, apothecaries, and a full time blacksmith.
- 3 Bandit hirelings. Randomised and respawning, let them take the arrows for you, and carry your stuff!
- 2 Unique followers, Mighty Bogruk & Sabreha (see below).
author: Ainulindale
